location.physicalLocation: British Library: India Office Records and Private Papers

titleInfo.title: Letter No. 116 to Rawson Hart Boddam, President and Governor for the Public Department, Council at Bombay, from Edward Galley at Bushire

mods.abstract: The letter discusses several administrative matters, explains that the GreyhoundBrig had a leak that required fixing and notes the arrival and departure of the ElizabethSnow and the Begler. The outstanding debt owed to the Resident (by the company) is also noted.
